status.description: The backup status, such as available.

object_count.description: The number of objects in the backup.

created_at.description:
The date and time when the server, image, or backup was created.

The date and time stamp format is ISO 8601 :

::
   CCYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ss±hh:mm
For example, ``2015-08-27T09:49:58-05:00`` .

The ``±hh:mm`` value, if included, is the time zone as an offset
from UTC.

If the updated-at date and time stamp is not set, its value is
``null`` .

has_dependent_backups.description:
Indicates whether the backup depends on other backups. If this
value is ``True`` , the backup depends on other backups.

volume_id.description: The ID of the volume from which the backup was created.

fail_reason.description: If the backup failed, the reason for the failure. Otherwise, null.

size.description: The size of the backup, in GB.

is_incremental.description:
Indicates whether the backup mode is incremental. If this value is
``True`` , the backup mode is incremental. If this value is
``False`` , the backup mode is full.
